body.description: Product Description Trendy is a beautiful doll's pram, in fashionable colors and is suitable for dolls up to 46 cm. With its adjustable handle, this pram is already suitable for the smallest girls, and will grow with them. With its four big wheels it is suitable also for uneven grounds. Furthermore the pram can be folded up quickly for transportation. Conveniently, the integrated shopping basket can store everything, which is needed for a trip with the doll's mum and her little darling. Set Contains: 1 x Dolls Pram; 1 x bag

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Bayer Design With our large range of lovely designed toys, children can realize great role plays or be creative!

Bayer Design, grey/pink Trendy is a beautiful doll's pram, in fashionable colours and is suitable for dolls up to 46 cm. With its adjustable handle, this pram is already suitable for the smallest girls, and will grow with them. Furthermore the pram can be folded up quickly for transportation. Conveniently, the integrated shopping basket can store everything, which is needed for a trip with the doll's mum and her little darling. Bayer Design, grey/pink Suitable for dolls up to 46 cm Height-adjustable handle from 39-68cm Easy foldable Including shoulder bag and shopping basket

Bayer Design, grey/pink Trendy in modern and elegant design Trendy has a modern design and is a real eye-catcher. It comes along with a shoulder bag and an underneath shopping basket. With its four big wheels it is also suitable for uneven ways. Trendy perfect for a trip Due to its height-adjustable handle the doll's mum/dad can find their perfect height for long walks in the forest, the city or just at home. Additionally the doll's pram Trendy is foldable for easy storage. Thus there is nothing to worry about the next trip with your doll or plush toy. Delievered with shoulder bag and underneath basket The delivery includes a cute matching shoulder bag and an underneath basket. With its beautiful design Trendy is a perfect Christmas or Birthday gift.

Our Vision Bayer Design set as aim to send children on an exciting and playful voyage of discovery. Due to our team’s motivation we are continually developing new products and ideas. Full of passion we develop playing concepts which support the different phases of playing growth of your child. Our dolls are almost the ideal companion for symbolic playing and role play, where day-to-day situations are re-enacted e.g. feeding the baby with its bottle, changing nappies, putting the baby to bed or going for a walk with the pram, alone or together. With our design and attention to detail we target the most realistic demonstration with the maximum of playing value. Bayer Design stands for Strong brand in the doll's pram sector Customer-friendly service Quality Safety

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 27, 2021
reviews.reviewText: It’s sooooo stinking cute . It came in a box with the picture of the stroller on the front so I was glad my daughter didn’t see it sitting outside since it’s a surprise . It was SUPER easy to put together. Just snapping the top on and adding the tires really , really simple . Took me not even a full 5 minutes . It’s sturdy and well made. Rolls so smoothly . It’s bigger than I imagined . For the price I was fully expecting something small and flimsy to come . It’s not at all . The basket part fits my daughters 18 inch baby doll perfectly with a little more room to spare too . I mean it’s seriously just so cute and so perfect. My only dislike would be the little diaper bag that came with it . I’m going to look for something else. It actually is so tiny and flimsy. Doesn’t even matter or take away from the awesome stroller . It’s worth every penny . Absolutely would recommend. If I can update with a picture of her pushing the stroller so you can get an idea of the size , once she opens it for her birthday I will !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Daughter loves this
reviews.reviewText: This was a Christmas gift to my 5 year old daughter and she absolutely loves it. It is adorable and works as it should so far. Seems to be of good quality and perfect size.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice quality!
reviews.reviewText: This stroller was the "hit" gift for our granddaughter this Christmas. It is very realistic and is just the right height for a 5-year-old. I recommend this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to put together
reviews.reviewText: Beautiful. Well made. The best part was that it doesn’t come in 20 separate parts, just a few large parts that are so easy to assemble.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I got this for my granddaughter. It requires a bit of assembly. As my husband put it together he was impressed with the quality! Well worth the money

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars My daughter loved it
reviews.reviewText: I got for my 7 yr old daughter for Christmas. She been wanting one. It’s super cute and nice. But kinda not tall enough for when she pushes it. But she likes it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quiet and sturdy
reviews.reviewText: My daughter loves this little stroller. Best part is it’s quiet and sturdy, fits big baby dolls too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024

reviews.reviewText: Buen diseño, calidad de sus materiales, fácil de armar, sin duda recomiendo este producto mi hija quedó encantada con sus reyes
Mia figlia ci gioca sempre, bambole trucchi mette dentro tutto
Era un regalo y la peque quedó encantada, el carro es precioso, fácil de montar, cómodo de llevar, ligero pero de buenos materiales... un acierto

The media could not be loaded. This was for my granddaughter for Christmas. It was perfect. Strong and well constructed. It can be collapsed to store or transport. Easy assembly took about 3 minutes. One ecstatic little girl. Thank you.
Llegó a tiempo, se lo regale a mi sobrina y le encantó. Muy buenos materiales y fácil de armar
